2+ Effect Monsters
If another monster(s) is Special Summoned to a zone a Link Monster points to while this card is in a Monster Zone: Discard up to 2 cards, then make your opponent randomly discard the same number of cards. If this card is Extra Linked: You can make your opponent randomly discard up to 2 cards, then, if your opponent has no cards in their hand as a result, inflict 3000 damage to your opponent. You can only use 1 effect of "Topologic Gamble Dragon" per turn, and only once that turn.
